name: To Get Her (macpac)
description:
Your lover has been captured and your mission is TO GET HER out of the dungeon. Collect shovels to dig deeper and find her.

Avoid crabs and lava pits, find shovels to dig deeper.

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD

Sprites made with Pixelorama and GIMP / Created in Godot Engine / Sound effects made with sfxr.me / Font: OwlsNInk by DubzyWubzyUbzy

This is my first finished game ever, all the assets apart from font were created by me. Game made for Mini Jame Gam #15 in < 3 days
